#summary Maven instructions.
#labels Maven

Soon charts4j will be on a public Maven repository.                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
In the meantime please                                                                                                                                                                                                                      

{{{                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
svn checkout http://charts4j.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ charts4j-read-only                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
cd charts4j-read-only/                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
mvn clean install                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
}}}
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
These commands will put charts4j in your local Maven repository.                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
For your project, you will then include this                                                                                                                                                                                         
XML snippet in your pom.xml.                                                                                                                                                                                                                
 
{{{                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<dependency>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
  <groupId>com.googlecode.charts4j</groupId>                                                                                                                                                                                                
  <artifactId>charts4j</artifactId>                                                                                                                                                                                                         
  <version>1.3-SNAPSHOT</version>                                                                                                                                                                                                           
</dependency>                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
 }}}
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
For Leiningen Clojure users please use:                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {{{[com.googlecode.charts4j/charts4j "1.3-SNAPSHOT"]}}}
